DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect orthodontic retainer transverse maxillary dental skeletal stability SARME .
DOC.brief_title: Orthodontic Retention Maxillary Stability After SARME Using Laser Scanner
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Ninety digitize dental cast 30 adult patient ( 18 male 12 female ) submit SARME use Hyrax expansion appliance evaluate . Patients distribute two group : Group Without Retention ( GSC ) n = 15 ; Group With Retention ( GCC ) n = 15 . In GCC group , Transpalatal Arch ( TPA ) instal retention soon removal expander . The dental cast scan use Vivid 9i 3D laser scanner ( Konica Minolta , Wayne , NJ ) . The plaster model perform preoperatively ( T1 ) , 4 month expander remove ( T2 ) , 10 month end expansion ( T3 ) . The distance measure Inter-Cusps Premolars Molars ( Inter-Cusp PM ) ( Inter-Cusp M ) , Inter-Cervicals Premolars Molars ( Inter-Cervical PM ) ( Inter-Cervical M ) , Inter-WALA edge Premolars Molars ( PM Inter-BW ) ( BW Inter-M ) , palatal height molar , palatal area volume T1 , T2 , T3 .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient bilateral transverse maxillary deficiency great 5 mm Patients previous history maxillary surgery , congenital craniofacial malformation unilateral transverse maxillary deficiency
